::Havoc::

The CR chamber got to work, trying to fix up Havoc. The bot's spark 
was almost gone, but the Iron Fist's state-of-the-art technology 
replaced damage systems and gave him needed power.

THe computer beeps, begginning the repair cycle after stabalizing his 
spark.




--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "THECODE" <thecode@p...> wrote:
> Burning Hammer looked around to make sure nobody was there, then he 
stepped
> out of his hiding place. He looked to the floor and seen Havoc, 
decapitated.
> 
> Burning Hammer: Oh, man, somebody didn't like you.
> 
> Burning Hammer grabbed a hold of Havoc and put him over one 
shoulder. He
> decided to go put him in a CR Tank. Burning Hammer walked to the CR 
room and
> put Havoc in a CR Tank. He watched Havoc's status...
